00015 // TComboBox Class
00016 //
00017 // It is the internal class which represents drop-down item list.
00018 //
00019 // In most cases, there is no need to modify or use this class directly
00020 // within your Application.
00021 //
00022 //***************************************************************************//
00023 
00024 class TComboBox : public QComboBox
00025 {
00026     friend class TDropList;
00027 
00028     Q_OBJECT
00029 
00030 public:
00031     TComboBox( QWidget *parent, TBaseValue *item );
00032 
00033     void setupText();
00034     void restoreText();
00035 
00036     virtual void showPopup();
00037 
00038     inline bool filled() const { return m_listLoaded; }
00039 
00040 signals:
00041     void restoreInvoked(void);
00042 
00043 protected slots:
00044     void onHighlight(int index);
00045 
00046 protected:
00047     virtual void keyPressEvent ( QKeyEvent *event );
00048     virtual void wheelEvent ( QWheelEvent *event );

00050     virtual void mouseDoubleClickEvent ( QMouseEvent *event );
00051     virtual void focusOutEvent ( QFocusEvent *event );
00052 
00053     void confirmEnter();

00055     void loadList();
00056 
00057     QString     m_lastText;
00058     TBaseValue  *m_item;

00061     
00062     //QString       m_lastStyle;
00063 };

00116 
00117     void        clear()         { m_box->clear(); };
00118     bool        isEmpty()       { return !(m_box->count()); };
00119 
00120     bool        setCurrent(TItemList *list/*, const QVariant &value*/);
00121     void        prepare()       { m_box->loadList(); }
00122
